data.text: @MauriceStierl @nsharma101 @refugeestudies These stories need to continue being told. They should not be forgotten.
@richardvogt2021 @nsharma101 @refugeestudies Wow, I'm impressed! Thanks for joining!!
@MauriceStierl @nsharma101 @refugeestudies Hey Maurice I made it on the right day (Australian time) this time! Thanks for the talk. https://t.co/7To3U5lgRh
@nsharma101 @refugeestudies There will be a recording, so please don't get up for this! :)
@MauriceStierl @refugeestudies I mean, I'll do my best to attend your talk. I just realized it starts at 7AM my time ;)
@MauriceStierl @refugeestudies Oh no! Hoping for a full and speedy recovery! Looking forward to hearing your talk tomorrow.
@MauriceStierl @refugeestudies Get well soon Maurice! This looks really great
